Row.Text: Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} is quite beneficial. I'm pleasantly surprised.
If you are trying to use your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} to get back at us, then you should know you are only making yourself look foolish.
I appreciate your supporting our proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. It's good to see you recognize a good idea when you see it.
Thank you for supporting our proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. I hate having to deal with Earthbound politics alone.
I know you think you're getting back at me by blocking my proposal to the {1_LeagueName}, but youa re only hurting your own people.
Don't continue to needlessly oppose my proposals to the {1_LeagueName}. You'll be better off if you just accept that I know what's best.
I appreciate your vote for us to host the next World Congress. The {1_LeagueName} will be a great opportunity to show off our proud cultural artifacts.
Your oafish "archaeologists" are destroying thousands of years of cultural artifacts with their inept excavations. Put a stop to it at once.
No. No, the archaeology will continue. Our museums and exhibits need something to compare to, to adequately show off how much greater our culture is.
Very well, the Princess will revoke her request for our archaeologists to dig on your land.
Hm. I should have expected as such. You don't know the value of what you're looking for, so of course you don't care if you destroy it.
Excellent. Should you wish to partake of our culture, our exhibitions are always open to you.

Thousands and thousands of rabbits are marching on my office, demanding freedom and liberation. I demand you stop your agitation for Freedom at once -- they are rabbits, they wouldn't know the first thing to do with freedom!

The rabbits of Eientei are protesting in the streets, demanding that I stop "exploiting" them and rally our society around Order. I know this is your doing. Maybe YOU would like to come here and try and institute Order, and keep track of millions and millions of identical-looking rabbits?

The rabbits of Eientei are... 'inspired' by your vision of Autocracy, and now they demand Princess Kaguya rise as their all-powerful leader who will make all of their concerns in life vanish. As if I needed my rabbits to be any more ignorant and helpless.

Your people have seen the success of our Lunarian society, and now they will never be satisfied until they have Freedom like our own. I doubt they will do as much with their freedoms as I can, but still, even the least of creatures deserves a chance to be great, don't they?

Your people have seen the success of our Lunarian society, and now they will never be satisfied until you can provide Order like our own. I doubt it will make them nearly as producitve or satisfied, but still, even the weakest laborer deserves protection, don't they?

Your people have seen the success of our Lunarian society, and now they will never be satisfied until you embrace Autocracy as we have. Of course, you could never be as glorious a Supreme Leader as a Lunarian could, but I don't doubt that your people will be at least somewhat satisfied with what you can provide.
At last, you have seen the light and accepted the path of Freedom! Your people will thank you, now that your leadership can no longer strip them of their rights.
At last, you have seen the light and accepted the path of Order! Your people will thank you, now that your leadership can no longer exploit them.
At last, you have seen the light and accepted the path of Autocracy! Your people will thank you for taking their decisions out of their own, inept hands.

Princess Kaguya is greatly enjoying your pop music and blue jeans. While I am disappointed to see her embracing your inferior alternative to Lunar culture, at least it got her out of that robe she's been wearing the past thousand years.
I'm glad to see your people embracing our superior Lunarian culture. I knew all those cultural exhibitions we put on weren't for nothing.
